title: E0310 gives invalid suggestion for explicit static lifetime bound

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler

labels.name: A-suggestion-diagnostics

body:
The error message given here makes it seem like the correct thing to do is change `cast_triggers: impl CastTriggers` to `cast_triggers: impl CastTriggers: 'static`.  The correct thing to do is `cast_triggers: impl CastTriggers + 'static`.

```
error[E0310]: the parameter type `impl CastTriggers` may not live long enough
  --> src/triggers.rs:76:35
   |
75 |     pub fn with_cast_triggers(mut self, cast_triggers: impl CastTriggers) -> Self {
   |                                                        ------------------ help: consider adding an explicit lifetime bound `impl CastTriggers: 'static`...
76 |         self.cast_triggers = Some(Arc::new(cast_triggers));
   |                                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
note: ...so that the type `impl CastTriggers` will meet its required lifetime bounds
  --> src/triggers.rs:76:35
   |
76 |         self.cast_triggers = Some(Arc::new(cast_triggers));
   |                                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```

[Context](https://github.com/czipperz/magic/blob/043a83cd26ee77ad331cd935b5fe6d01b235be9d/src/triggers.rs#L75)
